description: Gets the element with specific index among the selected elements.
returns: The second <li> element in the document

description: Gets the first element of the selected elements.
returns: The first <li> element in the document

description: Gets the last element of the selected elements.
returns: The last <li> element in the document

description: Gets the elements that matches the selector or pass the functionâ€™s test.
returns: All <p> elements that have a class "test-class".

description: Gets all elements that have the selector inside of them.
returns: All <p> elements that have button elements inside of them

description: Checks if the currently selected element matches the selector.
returns: True if the parent of the <p> element with id "id-name" iis a <div> element; otherwise, false

description: Gets all elements inside of the selected elements that do not match the selector.
returns: All <p> elements that do not have a class "test-class"

description: Gets a subset of currently selected elements starting with a index number. If the end index is specific, the selection ends with the index (exclusive).
returns: The first two <li> elements in the document
